linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64 bit
  • Processor: i3 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GeForce or Radeon with 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports stereo sound
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux 64 bit
  • Processor: i5 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GeForce or Radeon with 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports stereo sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Monterey 12
  • Processor: i3 (64 bit) or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GeForce or Radeon with 1 GB VRAM, Apple M1
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports stereo sound
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey 12
  • Processor: i5 (64 bit) or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GeForce or Radeon with 2 GB VRAM, Apple M1
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports stereo sound

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: i3 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GeForce or Radeon with 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports stereo sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: i5 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GeForce or Radeon with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports stereo sound
